AgentAuthentication.description: Represents authentication requirements for the agent.
AgentAuthentication.title: AgentAuthentication

AgentCapabilities.description: Represents optional capabilities supported by the agent.
AgentCapabilities.title: AgentCapabilities

AgentCard.description: Represents the agentâ€™s capabilities/skills and authentication mechanism.
AgentCard.title: AgentCard

AgentProvider.description: Represents the service provider of the agent.
AgentProvider.title: AgentProvider

AgentSkill.description: Represents a capability the agent can perform.
AgentSkill.title: AgentSkill

Artifact.description: Represents the end result generated by an agent as part of a Task.
Artifact.title: Artifact

AuthenticationInfo.description: Represents authentication credentials used by the agent to authenticate with the Push Notification Service when delivering asynchronous notifications.
AuthenticationInfo.title: AuthenticationInfo

PushNotificationNotSupportedError.description: Indicates that the agent does not support delivering updates via push notifications.

message.description: A short description of the error
message.title: Message

PushNotificationNotSupportedError.title: PushNotificationNotSupportedError

CancelTaskRequest.description: Represents a JSON-RPC request to cancel a specific Task identified by the `TaskIdParams`.
CancelTaskRequest.title: CancelTaskRequest

CancelTaskResponse.description: Represents the JSON-RPC response containing the cancelled `Task`.
CancelTaskResponse.title: CancelTaskResponse

DataPart.description:
Represents a content part within a Message or Artifact.

The 'data' field contains key-value pairs of arbitrary content.
DataPart.title: DataPart

FileContent.description:
Represents a content of a file, either as base64-encoded bytes or a URI.

Ensures that either 'bytes' or 'uri' is provided, but not both.
FileContent.title: FileContent

FilePart.description:
Represents a content part within a Message or Artifact.

The 'file' field contains the actual file content, represented by a `FileContent` object.
FilePart.title: FilePart

GetTaskPushNotificationRequest.description: Represents a JSON-RPC request to retrieve the Push Notification Config for a specific Task identified by `TaskIdParams`.
GetTaskPushNotificationRequest.title: GetTaskPushNotificationRequest

GetTaskPushNotificationResponse.description: Represents the JSON-RPC response containing the Push Notification Config for a specific Task identified by `TaskPushNotificationConfig`.
GetTaskPushNotificationResponse.title: GetTaskPushNotificationResponse

GetTaskRequest.description: Represents a JSON-RPC request to retrieve the generated Artifacts and metadata for a specific Task identified by `TaskQueryParams`.
GetTaskRequest.title: GetTaskRequest

GetTaskResponse.description: Represents the JSON-RPC response containing the requested `Task`.
GetTaskResponse.title: GetTaskResponse

InternalError.description: Indicates an internal JSON-RPC error that occurred during the processing of the request.

message.description: A short description of the error
message.title: Message

InternalError.title: InternalError

InvalidParamsError.description: Indicates that the parameters provided in the JSON-RPC request are invalid or malformed.

message.description: A short description of the error
message.title: Message

InvalidParamsError.title: InvalidParamsError

InvalidRequestError.description: Indicates that the JSON-RPC request payload is invalid.

message.description: A short description of the error
message.title: Message

InvalidRequestError.title: InvalidRequestError

JSONParseError.description: Indicates that invalid JSON was sent.

message.description: A short description of the error
message.title: Message

JSONParseError.title: JSONParseError

JSONRPCError.description: Represents a standard error object conforming to the JSON-RPC 2.0 specification.
JSONRPCError.title: JSONRPCError

JSONRPCMessage.description: Represents the base structure of a JSON-RPC 2.0 message, conforming to the JSON-RPC 2.0 specification.
JSONRPCMessage.title: JSONRPCMessage

JSONRPCRequest.description: Represents a JSON-RPC 2.0 request message, conforming to the JSON-RPC 2.0 specification.
JSONRPCRequest.title: JSONRPCRequest

JSONRPCResponse.description: Represents a JSON-RPC 2.0 response message, conforming to the JSON-RPC 2.0 specification.
JSONRPCResponse.title: JSONRPCResponse

Message.description: Represents a Message, which contains any content that is not an Artifact.
Message.title: Message

MethodNotFoundError.description: Indicates the method is not valid.

message.description: A short description of the error
message.title: Message

MethodNotFoundError.title: MethodNotFoundError

PushNotificationConfig.description: Represents a Push Notification Config for a Task.
PushNotificationConfig.title: PushNotificationConfig

Part.description: Represents a fully formed piece of content exchanged between a client and a remote agent as part of a Message or an Artifact.
Part.title: Part

SendTaskRequest.description: Represents a JSON-RPC request to start a new Task, resume an interrupted one, or reopen a completed Task.
SendTaskRequest.title: SendTaskRequest

SendTaskResponse.description: Represents the JSON-RPC response containing the requested `Task`.
SendTaskResponse.title: SendTaskResponse

SendTaskStreamingRequest.description: Represents a JSON-RPC request to start a new Task with streaming enabled using SSE.
SendTaskStreamingRequest.title: SendTaskStreamingRequest

SendTaskStreamingResponse.description: Represents the streamed JSON-RPC response containing updates for a specific Task, delivered as either a `TaskStatusUpdateEvent` or `TaskArtifactUpdateEvent`, and initiated with SSE.
SendTaskStreamingResponse.title: SendTaskStreamingResponse

SetTaskPushNotificationRequest.description: Represents a JSON-RPC request for setting a Push Notification Config for a specific Task identified by `TaskPushNotificationConfig`.
SetTaskPushNotificationRequest.title: SetTaskPushNotificationRequest

SetTaskPushNotificationResponse.description: Represents the JSON-RPC response containing the requested `TaskPushNotificationConfig`.
SetTaskPushNotificationResponse.title: SetTaskPushNotificationResponse

Task.description: Represents a stateful entity created by the client to achieve a specific outcome. A Task contains a status managed by the remote agent, a list of Artifacts as results, and an optional history of Messages.
Task.title: Task

TaskPushNotificationConfig.description: Represents the configuration for Push Notifications associated with a specific Task, including the notification settings and an identifier for the Task.
TaskPushNotificationConfig.title: TaskPushNotificationConfig

TaskNotCancelableError.description: Indicates that the Task cannot be canceled by the remote agent.

message.description: A short description of the error
message.title: Message

TaskNotCancelableError.title: TaskNotCancelableError

TaskNotFoundError.description: Indicates the Task was not found with the provided ID.

message.description: A short description of the error
message.title: Message

TaskNotFoundError.title: TaskNotFoundError

TaskIdParams.description: Represents the parameters required to identify a specific Task by its Task ID.
TaskIdParams.title: TaskIdParams

TaskQueryParams.description: Represents the parameters used to query a specific Task by its Task ID, including optional history length and metadata.
TaskQueryParams.title: TaskQueryParams

TaskSendParams.description: Represents the parameters required for sending content to a remote agent to start, resume, or reopen a specific Task identified by its Task ID.
TaskSendParams.title: TaskSendParams

TaskState.description: Represents the current lifecycle state of a Task.
TaskState.title: TaskState

TaskStatus.description: Represents the current status of a Task including its lifecycle state and an optional message providing additional context.
TaskStatus.title: TaskStatus

TaskResubscriptionRequest.description: Represents a JSON-RPC request to resubscribe to updates for a specific Task identified `TaskQueryParams`.
TaskResubscriptionRequest.title: TaskResubscriptionRequest

TaskStatusUpdateEvent.description: Represents an event containing an update on the status of the requested Task, streamed via SSE.
TaskStatusUpdateEvent.title: TaskStatusUpdateEvent

TaskArtifactUpdateEvent.description: Represents an event containing an update on the artifact of the requested Task, streamed via SSE.
TaskArtifactUpdateEvent.title: TaskArtifactUpdateEvent

TextPart.description:
Represents a content part within a Message or Artifact.

The 'text' field contains the actual text content.
TextPart.title: TextPart

UnsupportedOperationError.description: Indicates that the operation requested is not supported.

message.description: A short description of the error
message.title: Message

UnsupportedOperationError.title: UnsupportedOperationError

A2ARequest.description: Represents a request that can be one of several Task-related operations, including sending, getting, canceling a task, setting or getting push notifications, or resubscribing to a Task.
A2ARequest.title: A2ARequest
